snippet: Doctors found malignant cells during tests in Cuba, President Hugo Chávez of Venezuela said, adding that his vice president would succeed him if his health worsened.
abstract: Venezuelan Pres Hugo Chavez says he will have to undergo another operation for cancer and designates Vice Pres Nicolas Maduro as his successor if he should prove unable to continue to lead country.
lead_paragraph: Doctors found malignant cells during tests in Cuba, President Hugo Chávez of Venezuela said, adding that his vice president would succeed him if his health worsened.

headline.seo: Somber Chávez to Have Surgery and Names Successor
headline.main: Chávez Says His Cancer Has Returned and Names His Successor
headline.print_headline: Chávez Says His Cancer Has Returned
